monogr.title: A boke of prayers called ye ordynary faschyon of good lyuynge

div.p: THIS lytell treaty • e is made for the erudicion of the simple, and yonge babes of god. And yet nat to be dispised of the great clerk{is}, & myghty ydel loubers: ye lyue here in earth lyke as hogges do ī wodes: whiche goeth vnder ye crabbe trees, and eate vp the crabbes ye lye vpō ye grounde, & neuer loke vp to the tre from whens they fel but wander on, sekyng vpō ye groūde for mo, euyn so do these ydel lobers, ye deuoure ye gyftes of god, & do receyue innumerable rewardes & benefites at his handes: and yet neuer loke vp to gyue him thankes: but lyue here in earth ydelly, & wretchedly (as I may say(. This lytell boke therfore shal. be to put them in mynde of a peace of theyr dutye. And to exhorte thē to vse an ordinary fassyon of prayenge bycause they shal nat forget theyr dutye vse therfore prayer at nyght & in the mornynge all busynes layde a syde.
